title: Biden admin bracing for up to 70K COVID deaths this winter as booster uptake flops

description: $1,499 doesn't buy you a decent update plan from Microsoft.

title: New maps of ancient warming reveal strong response to carbon dioxide
description: Past warming hints at rising sensitivity to CO<sub>2</sub>, widespread changes in rainfall.

title: Google can now remove your identifying search results, if they’re the right kind

title: Leftover hardware from Mars mission to be used on the Moon
